topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: CGI Tools/Libraries

name: Shark CGI Function
short_description: The Shark CGI Function simplifies programming CGI's in C. It extracts variables and contents from GET, POST & multipart/form-data forms (including file uploads and cookies) and makes them accessible as environment variables. See homepage for more info.
